data.text: @1NewsNZ Charge them ... an assault conviction on their record. Don't need  to study any more, cause won't get jobs in many fields. Can't leave the country, other countries won't let you in.  Their future working as a labourer in Dunedin. Shame
@1NewsNZ Boo hoo did anyone of them die? No so shut up with your rubbish gutter reports about nothing!
@1NewsNZ The respect these days. People who cough and spit on others are disgraceful. Regardless the situation it's fkn gross

@1NewsNZ Even during a pandemic, these entitled shits get ugly if their mob-imposed ‘right to party’ is challenged. Arrests or a trip to the proctor are a total joke. Like the feral protesters, RESPECT is now dead. Time the empowered few faced real consequences, or it gets worse for NZ.

@1NewsNZ Cops are OK, they are vaxxed and their magical mandates will protect them...
...ANYONE who has ANY commutable illness and behaves like this should be automatically jailed!
@1NewsNZ The police were blasting them with James Blunt and Barry Manilow tracks at the protest last week. That's far more abusive.
